3: Haicma wishes she could play the never-ending game of questions with Nanami once again as they did in that small room.
But she also knows that this Nanami is no longer the Nanami from the past... and Haicma herself is not who she once was either.
Now, Haicma is the Church of Machina's 'Hermit'... and Nanami is the ultimate purpose they seek.
Nanami understands all your fears and confusions because just like you... I've also seen the worst endings between machines and humans in countless futures.
Whether or not your mission here succeeds today, machines and humans might still destroy each other under the threat of the Punishing Virus...
If that's the case... what is the purpose of everything you've done?
Nanami skips down from Power and lands on the ground, tilting her head to ponder.
You're not wrong... perhaps nothing Nanami does means anything in the future. But some people still do their best, believing that the future can be changed one step at a time.
Looking at the blue planet that seems to be within reach, Nanami smiles tenderly.
The humans that everyone thinks are weak are still fighting on Earth against endless despair with nothing but a trace of hope. Nanami will look so lame if she keeps running away!
Nanami will try her best and do what she can... as a friend of humans and a sage of the awakened machines.
I'm going to lead the machines to the future I've chosen, the future where machines and humans can love each other.
Looking at Nanami's face, Haicma truly feels Nanami's growth for the first time...
Wait! Nanami can also draw the things she saw and show you!
I'll bring them with me and show you if there's a next time.
You don't need to draw me pictures anymore. I've walked past those sights you've seen. The traces of you have guided me all along.
...How about Nanami calls you 'Haicma' from now on?
Haicma!
This name, this gift you gave me, is something I have and will always treasure.
Whoa... This is the first time I've had such a clear dream! Who are you?
Even though you don't know me anymore, those memories have not faded a bit.
All her doubts and confusions crumble in an instant. Haicma finally understands why she has been resisting the 'correct' future.
It is because that is not the future she wants. She wants Nanami to make a different choice. She wants the future to look different.
Nanami is what the experiment wanted to achieve—a machine's love is freed from the shackles of programming. Kindness and affection from humans have paved a path to the future for machines.
But who is she to shackle Nanami once again? All the things she wanted to say plunge back into the dark pond.
Nanami is still the girl Haicma remembers, but she is also the Sagemachina every machine follows.
Sage, I will stay by your side no matter what you choose... always.
Nanami smiles, extending a hand toward Haicma.
In that case, nice to meet you, Haicma... and Lazer!
Huh...? Am I Lazer...?
You... remember my name?
Yep! You're Nanami's friend, Haicma!
Even though Nanami's memories of Haicma from the past have been erased, Nanami remembers her from the future when they became friends.
Perhaps it is a coincidence, a bug in the infinite calculations—but Nanami and Haicma will always become friends regardless of which future comes true.
Right... Haicma... is Nanami's firend.
Haicma clutches Nanami's hand. This is her first promise to herself—but one of her infinite identical promises in the infinite timelines: she will always become Nanami's friend.
...And so, Nanami has decided to begin the real journey!
You have said that before...
This is different!
Someone told Nanami something very important. Now, I'm going to search for that treasure!
The girl hides her hands behind her back as if keeping a devious secret, but her eyes glisten with resolve.
But to make that dream come true, we're going to need everybody.
Nanami is going to find more companions and gather everyone together.
Because there are many more friends waiting for me.
You are not making something up just so you can disappear and have fun somewhere else, are you?
Of course not!
Nanami is not leaving any friends behind this time.
Martin, Rohacchi, Haicma, Lazer...
...And all the lost children. Nanami will bring them home.
Location data. From Nanami. Confirmed.
Then... let's go, my new adventure party!
The many incomplete graffiti gather here, and together they form one complete picture.
